member.name: IP_PREFIX_ORIGIN
member.summary: The IP_PREFIX_ORIGIN enumeration specifies the origin of an IPv4 or IPv6 address prefix, and is used with the structure.

member.name: IP_PREFIX_ORIGIN.IpPrefixOriginOther
member.summary: The IP prefix was provided by a source other than those defined in this enumeration.

member.name: IP_PREFIX_ORIGIN.IpPrefixOriginManual
member.summary: The IP address prefix was manually specified.

member.name: IP_PREFIX_ORIGIN.IpPrefixOriginWellKnown
member.summary: The IP address prefix is from a well known source.

member.name: IP_PREFIX_ORIGIN.IpPrefixOriginDhcp
member.summary: The IP address prefix was provided by DHCP settings.

member.name: IP_PREFIX_ORIGIN.IpPrefixOriginRouterAdvertisement
member.summary: The IP address prefix was obtained through a router advertisement (RA).

summary.para: The IP address prefix should be unchanged. This value is used when setting the properties for a unicast IP interface when the value for the IP prefix origin should be left unchanged.
summary.div: Note This enumeration value is only available on Windows Vista and later.
